C

ContextClassBuilder - Interface in org.teatrove.maven.teacompiler.contextclassbuilder.api
Implementations are responsible for building a Class that will be used as the runtime context for the Tea compiler.

ContextClassBuilderHelper - Interface in org.teatrove.maven.teacompiler.contextclassbuilder.api
This is the interface that all helpers will use.
